front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Radar Cross-Section Test Procedures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The process of the measurement of the radar cross section of objects using a test range is described in this recommended practice. The term radar cross section (RCS) is defined, and the characteristics of different types of test ranges are given. The responsibilities of the test range operators are shown to involve test and calibration of the measurement range systems and to take the measurements accurately. Techniques are described for each stage of this process.
